PSCT.Base: During your Main Phase, send 1 "Numeron" Normal Spell Card that meets its activation conditions from your Deck to the GY; this effect becomes that Spell's effect when that card is activated. You can only use this effect of "Numeron Network" once per turn. "Numeron" Xyz Monsters you control can activate effects without detaching material(s).
